prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Brass, Piano, Guitar, Reed, but without Bass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Brass, Piano, Guitar, Reed, but no Bass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Brass, Piano, Guitar, Reed, yet no Bass.

Style 3:
This composition consists of Drums, Brass, Piano, Guitar, Reed, excluding Bass.
